org.gearvrf.script

Class GVRLuaScriptFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.script.GVRScriptFile
      • org.gearvrf.script.GVRLuaScriptFile

  • public class GVRLuaScriptFile
extends GVRScriptFile
    Represents a Lua script file. The script text can be loaded in one of the following ways.
    • Loaded from a GVRAndroidResource using GVRScriptManager.loadScript(org.gearvrf.GVRAndroidResource, String).
    • Constructed locally and then set the text using GVRScriptFile.setScriptText(String).
    • Constructed locally and then load the text using GVRScriptFile.load(InputStream).
    Once a script text is set or loaded, you can invoke functions in the script using GVRScriptFile.invokeFunction(String, Object[]), or attach it to a scriptable object using GVRScriptManager.attachScriptFile(IScriptable, GVRScriptFile) to handle events delivered to it.
